metadata.name: Punk ist 7Ø7! #240
metadata.description:
Unique NFT: Punk ist 7Ø7! #240
NFT format: 800 x 800 px / GIF / 6.9MB

Project: AnarchyPunks – The 7O7 Postal Edition
Project page: https://alexandru-crisan.com/projects/the-7o7-postal-edition/

Unlockable: claimable 40 x 40 cm unique signed physical art print, specially crafted with revealed transparencies.

You purchased an original, unique digital animated artwork created by Alexandru Crisan. A unique art print signed by the author, specially crafted with revealed transparencies of the images, is also available for the buyer, only upon express request. Send us an email with a proof of item purchase, provide your address in order to send you the unique signed art print.

Website: https://alexandru-crisan.com/, 
Contact: info@alexandru-crisan.com

More details and updates on Collection Description.
